title: Legend of the Mystic Knights
description: The world has been taken over by evil monsters spawned in hell itself. So powerful is the evil that civilization has been stuck in the medieval times for the last 1,000 years. The only hope for humankind is a page training to be a knight. Is the simple page the one prophesied to remove the evil from our world? Can this page become a knight, so he can fulfill his destiny? All he has to do is survive long enough. Legend of the Mystic Knights is the debut novel by W.A.Rusho Combining elements of fantasy with realistic accounts of medieval living, the author has created a book that not only entertains but also educates
author: W.A. Rusho
